description: Add search and filtering to admin players page

userStories.title: Add search input to admin players page
userStories.description: As an admin, I want to search players by name so I can quickly find specific players.
acceptanceCriteria: Search input appears at top of players table
Filters players by firstName and lastName (case-insensitive)
Updates results in real-time as user types
Type checking passes: npm run check-types

userStories.title: Add team filter dropdown
userStories.description: As an admin, I want to filter players by team so I can view team rosters.
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown shows 'All Teams' plus all team names
Filters players to show only members of selected team
Works in combination with search input
Type checking passes: npm run check-types

userStories.title: Add age group filter dropdown
userStories.description: As an admin, I want to filter players by age group so I can view specific age divisions.
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown shows 'All Age Groups' plus all age groups
Filters players by their enrollment age group
Works with search and team filters
Type checking passes: npm run check-types

userStories.title: Persist filters in URL params
userStories.description: As an admin, I want filters to persist in URL so I can bookmark filtered views.
acceptanceCriteria: Age group filter stored in ?ageGroup= param
Filters restore from URL on page load
Type checking passes: npm run check-types
